The activity Margot likes most is one she has enjoyed ever since she was young: planting and harvesting coffee. Coffee is profitable because it is one of the most popular rain forest products, despite the costly investments that are involved in purchasing fertilizer and the problems encountered in planting and adapting the land for adequate growth and production. This is Margot's first loan with Kiva partner MFP. Margot will use the money--800 Soles ($275)--to purchase fertilizer for her arable land.

Translated from Spanish by Christopher Knutson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing fertilizer for her arable land

loans.name: Delfina

texts.es: hola mi nombre es Delfina P. L. mi actividad principal es el servicio de cortes de pelo, peinados, cortes de uñas para damas, tambien vendo productos para cabello como ser shampoo, acondicionador, gel, tintes, gotas de todo tipo de producto para cabello de dama, mi negocio se llama Salon de Belleza MIXE, este negocio me permite generar ingresos monetarios para cubrir con los gastos de mi hogar, tengo pocos años de dedicarme a este negocio, creo que he sido buena administradora, pero en estos momentos necesito comprar materiales como ser tijeras, maquinas electricas de cortar pelo, aceite, jabones, etc, por eso es que estoy solicitando un credito para poder dar una mejor atencion a mis clientes. soy madre de 4 hijos.
texts.en:
Hi! My name is Delfina P. L. and I am a hairdresser. I cut and style hair, do ladies' manicures as well as sell hair products such as shampoo, conditioner, gel, hair colour, all sorts of hair products for ladies. My business is called MIXE Beauty Salon. The income from my salon allows me to pay my household expenses. Although I have not been in this business very long, I believe I've managed my salon well. I now need to buy tools such as scissors, electric razors, oil, soap, etc. and this is why I am asking you for a loan, so that I can give my clients better service. I am the mother of 4 children.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy products.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: María

texts.es: María tiene 21 años, convive con su pareja y tiene  tres hijos. Ella es agricultora, actividad a la que se dedica por 4 años desde que tuvo su familia, dentro de su trabajo, lo que le agrada realizar es la selección de las frutas para su venta posterior. Lo rentable es que a su comunidad  concurren grandes comerciantes que demandan grandes cantidades de fruta. Lo difícil es encontrar  el mejor postor que le ayude a tener las ganancias justas. Esta en su cuarto préstamo con MFP, y no tiene  moras, ni retrasos de pagos. María  tiene pensado invertir 1000 soles en la compra de plantas de cítricos de  diversas variedades, y sobre todo en los abonos que  necesita  para sus terrenos.
texts.en:
María is 21 years old, lives with her partner and has three children. She is a farmer and has done that work for four years since she has had a family. What she likes about her work is making the selection of fruits to then sell. It is profitable because in her community there are large buyers that compete for large amounts of fruit. The difficult part is finding the highest bidder that allows her to make earnings that are fair. This is her fourth loan with MFP and she has had no delays or gotten behind in her payments. María is thinking to invest 1,000 soles in a wide variety of citric plans and above all, in the fertilizer she needs for her land.

Translated from Spanish by Hugh Yarbrough, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase citric plans and fertilizer

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es: La señora Josefa es una persona que desde muy temprano por la mañana se dirige hacia su trabajo y regresa hasta ya por la tarde a su hogar con su familia demostrando una gran responsabilidad y grandes ganas de salir adelante, ella esta solicitando este credito para la construcción de una barda en la parte lateral de su casa ya que desea mayor seguridad y un poco mas de privacidad y asi lograr un mejor estilo de vida.
texts.en:
Josefa is a person who early in the morning leaves for work and doesn't return to her home until very late, demonstrating to her family a great sense of responsibility and the desire to get ahead. She is requesting this loan to construct a wall on the side of her house because she wants better security and a little more privacy in order to achieve a better quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Hugh Yarbrough, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Construct a wall for protection and privacy

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Milton

texts.es: Milton tiene 23 años, es soltero y vive con sus padres. Se a la agricultura por 6 años, actividad que le agrada realizar, sobre todo en la producción de plátanos,  ya que es más fácil cosechar y menos trabajoso de realizar, además son quincenales o mensuales las cosechas, y sus ingresos entonces, son  mensuales. Sin embargo, lo difícil es poder plantar las plantas de plátanos, ya que hay que  dividir y medir bien los pozos donde  se pondrán  las plantas  para su  adecuado crecimiento. Está en su cuarto crédito con MFP, y no tuvo observaciones en sus pagos. Milton gastará un monto de 900 soles en la compra de plantas  de plátanos  y en la  compra de abonos para sus terrenos cultivables.
texts.en:
Milton is 23 years old, single and lives with his parents. He has worked as a farmer for six years, work that he enjoys doing, especially banana production because the harvest is easier and takes less work to do. Besides, the harvests are every two weeks or monthly and therefore his income is monthly. Nevertheless, it is difficult to sow the banana plants because you have to divide and measure the holes where you are going to put the plants very well for their adequate growth. This is the fourth loan with MFP and he has not had any difficulties with the payments. Milton will spend 900 soles on banana plants and fertilizer for his farmland.

Translated from Spanish by Hugh Yarbrough, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase banana plants and fertilizer

loans.name: Monica

texts.es: Mónica tiene 28 años, es casada, tiene tres hijos  menores de edad. Se dedica a  su pequeña bodega que tiene desde hace  3 años  en su casa. Este negocio le permitido aumentar sus ingresos económicos, también le ayudo a poder  estar junto a sus hijos, siendo esto lo que le agrada, tener un negocio  en casa. Sumado a ello, la venta en su bodega es  favorable, debido a que en su comunidad  las tiendas  son muy pocas. Pero lo difícil de esta actividad es poder adquirir la mercadería que  requiere  para su tienda, para ello tiene que bajar a la ciudad a realizar sus compras. Es su cuarto préstamo con MFP, no ha tenido demoras en sus pagos correspondientes. Mónica invertirá el dinero en la compra de productos de primera necesidad, los cuales son los más requeridos en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Mónica is 28 years old, is married and has three young children. She is dedicated to her small convenience store that she has had for 3 years in her house. This business allows her to augment her income and also helped her to be together with her children, this is what she likes about having a business in her home. In addition, sales at her convenience store are favorable because in her community there are few stores. The difficult part is acquiring the goods required in the shop because she has to go into the city to purchase things. This is her fourth loan with MFP; she has not had delays in her payments. Mónica will invest the money in the purchase of essential goods, those that are most needed in her community.

Translated from Spanish by Helen Smith, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase merchandise for her grocery store

loans.name: Juan Rodolfo

texts.es: El señor Juan es una persona joven de edad pero con grandes ambiciones de salir adelante, el es trailero y desde muy chico ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y trabajadora, el ahora por medio de este credito quiere acabar con el proyecto de la colocación del vitro piso de su casa al igual con otros acabados interiores y asi lograr tener un hogar mas cómodo.
texts.en:
Señor Juan is still a young man but with big plans for the future. He’s a truck driver, and ever since he was a boy he has shown himself to be responsible and hard working. He now wants to use his loan to finish a project putting Vitro flooring in his house as well as completing other interior work so that he will have more comfortable home.

Translated from Spanish by Jane Agg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Complete interior work on his home

loans.name: Nermi

texts.es: Nermi es una señora de 40 años, vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos. Trabaja muy duramente en sus terrenos de producción de palta, mangos y cítricos, actividad que realiza por 20 años, siendo el cultivo de  mangos  y plátanos lo que más le agrada de entre todas sus actividades, ya que es un producto altamente  productivo y de corta producción, lo cual ayuda a que mensualmente  tenga posibilidad de comercializarlo. Aunque lo más dificultoso es poder limpiar  sus terrenos cultivables por las diversas yerbas que crecen en el contorno de ellas. Es el primer préstamo que  obtiene con MFP. Nermi está dispuesta a incrementar  sus terrenos cultivables, por ello requiere de la cantidad que solicita para seguir trabajando en su producción.
texts.en:
Nermi is a 40-year old woman who lives with her husband and their three children. She works very hard in her fields where she grows avocadoes, mangos, and citrus fruits. She has been engaged in this work for the last 20 years. Growing mangos and bananas is what pleases her the most out of all her activities since they produce a lot of fruit in a short time. This is a great benefit as she can market the fruit monthly. The most difficult part of her work is to keep her fields clear of the weeds that grow all around. This is the Nermi’s first loan with MFP. She is planning to expand the area under cultivation and increase production.

Translated from Spanish by Jane Agg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase production on her farm

loans.name: Norma Azucena

texts.es:
La señora norma es una persona responsable de mediana edad, casada y con familia;
Tiene su propio negocio que es una  tiendita de abarrotes a la que le ha dedicado tiempo, esfuerzo, y dinero con tal de hacerlo crecer y tener una mejor calidad de vida para ella y su familia. Es por ello que solicita este credito para comprar mas mercancía para su negocio.
texts.en:
Señora Norma is a responsible middle-aged woman, married, and with a family. She owns her own small grocery store to which she has dedicated time, energy, and money. Now she wishes to expand it to improve her own and her family’s quality of life. For this reason she is now seeking a loan to buy more merchandise for her business.

Translated from Spanish by Jane Agg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy more merchandise for her store

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa tiene 49 años, es divorciada, vive con sus cuatro hijos menores de edad. Ella es agricultora, cultiva cítricos por más de 30 años, ya que es la actividad que le ayudó a  mantener su hogar. Ella comenta que  dentro de su trabajo lo que más le gusta es  cosechar, por lo divertido que le parece  el treparse a los árboles y  sacar los frutos, estos son los más rentables por la identificación de la zona selva con ellos. Sin embargo lo difícil es tener que limpiar  sus  árboles de naranja  y protegerlos de los  insectos. Es su primer préstamo con MFP. Rosa comprará  insecticidas y abonos para sus plantaciones con el dinero que solicita.
texts.en:
49-year old Rosa is divorced and lives with her four children. She is a farmer and has grown citrus fruit for more than 30 years. The income from this business has helped her support her family. She says that the most pleasing part of her work is the harvest—she enjoys climbing up the trees to gather the fruit. The fruit is very profitable--people like it as it comes from the jungle. On the other hand, the most difficult part of her work is keeping her orange trees disease-free and protecting them from insects. This is her first loan with MFP. With the money she plans to buy insecticide and fertilizer for the trees.

Translated from Spanish by Jane Agg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase fertilizer and insecticide

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.es: Rosalia tiene 40 años, es casada, tiene cuatro hijos quienes son su adoración. Ella se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, los cuales cría y vende en los mercados, esta actividad la realiza por más de 10 años. Siendo dentro de todo, la crianza, lo que más le agrada, con esta labor tiene grandes ganancias, todo depende de cómo estén alimentados  y cuidados  los animales, porque para que el precio del animal sea rentable, tiene  tratar de que logren un peso adecuado para su venta. Se encuentra en su cuarto préstamo con MFP, durante  el tiempo de permanencia  no tuvo problemas de pago. Rosalia comprará dos cerditos y dos cuyes de raza para aumentar su costo de venta en los mercados.
texts.en:
40-year old Rosalia is married and has four children whom she adores. She raises young animals and then sells them in the markets. She’s been doing this for more than 10 years. Seeing the animals grow is what pleases her the most about her work. She makes good profits from her hard work. Everything depends on how the animals are fed and cared for. She has to ensure that the animals reach a suitable weight so they can be sold. This is Rosalia’s fourth loan with MFP, and there have never been any problems with repayment. With this money she will buy two piglets and two guinea pigs to be used as breeding stock. These purchases will enable her to earn more money in the market.

Translated from Spanish by Jane Agg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase piglets and guinea pigs

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es: Rubén tiene 33 años, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos. Es agricultor, en especial se dedica al cultivo de café, ya que le gusta el proceso de secar los granos para luego llevarlos a los depósitos más cercanos  de su ciudad. Vender café es rentable, por temporadas duplican su precio, para ello se preparan por años, siendo lo más difícil  tener que sembrar las plantaciones de café, porque hay que distribuirlas  adecuadamente haciendo pozos para cada planta. Es su primer préstamo con MFP. Rubén tendrá que invertir en la compra de abonos y nuevas plantas de café  que sembrará.
texts.en:
33-year old Rubén lives with his wife and three children. He is a farmer specializing in growing coffee. He likes the process of drying the grains so that he can then take them to the warehouses nearest the city. Selling coffee is a profitable business as at certain times of the year, the price doubles, but it takes years to get to that point. The most difficult part of his work is the planting, making sure that the plants are distributed evenly, and making indentations for water around each plant. This is his first loan with MFP. Rubén is planning to buy fertilizer and new coffee plants with the money.

Translated from Spanish by Jane Agg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase fertilizer and coffee plants

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: El señor Ricardo es empleado mecánico de una empresa reconocida de la ciudad, el esta solicitando este credito para terminar la ampliación de su vivienda y lograr mayor comodidad `para el y su familia.
texts.en:
Mr. Ricardo is a mechanic for a business recognized by the city, he is requesting this loan to finish the expansion of his home and achieve greater comfort for himself and his family.

Translated from Spanish by Helen Smith, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Expand his house

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia es una mujer de 35 años, vive con su pareja y sus 5 hijos menores de edad. Se dedica al cultivo de diversidad de frutas desde hace 30 años, ya que desde muy niña trabajó con sus padres, ahora trabaja para mantener su hogar. Para Sonia no es desagradable su labor, le agrada  estar en el campo  y sembrar diversas frutas típicas de la selva central, sobre todo el arroz que ahora está siendo uno de los productos más rentable por la demanda de los comerciantes, aunque para ello se tenga que invertir mayor tiempo y dinero, por lo delicado que es y por la cantidad de agua que necesita para su producción. Es el primer préstamo que  obtiene con MFP. Sonia  desea poder  invertir 500 nuevos soles en la  siembra de  arroz que  está iniciando.
texts.en:
Sonia is a 35 year old woman and lives with her partner and her 5 young children. She has been dedicated to cultivating a variety of fruits for 30 years since she was a girl working with her parents, now she works to maintain her home. For Sonia her work is not unpleasant, she enjoys being in the country and growing diverse fruits typical in the central jungle,above all rice that is now one of the products in great demand by traders, although for this she has to invest more time and money because it is delicate and for the amount of water needed for its production. This is the first loan she is obtaining from MFP. Sonia wants to invest 500 soles (US $325) in the planting of rice that she is starting.

Translated from Spanish by Helen Smith, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Invest in the next planting of rice

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: Teodora es una señora de 38 años, vive con su pareja y sus 5 hijos menores de edad. Se dedica al cultivo de cítricos, actividad que realiza hace 18 años, siendo  la cosecha lo que más le  agrada realizar, ya que le parece entretenido  poder cosechar junto a sus hijos y su pareja. Además, dentro de su comunidad  tienen la ventaja de que sus frutos cítricos tienen gran acogida y demanda en el mercado, lo cual les da ventajas  para trabajar. Aunque lo difícil es poder sembrar y cuidar los terrenos, ya que con el clima caluroso pueden quemarse los productos o ser consumidos por los insectos. Este es su cuarto préstamo, no ha tenido ningún inconveniente en los pagos. Teodora  invertirá en la compra  de  insecticidas y de abonos para su terreno de  cítricos.
texts.en:
Teodora is a 38 year old woman, lives with her partner and their 5 young children. She is dedicated to cultivating citrus, an activity she has done for 18 years. The harvest is what pleases her the most because it seems fun to be able to reap alongside her children and her partner. Moreover, within their community they have the advantage that their citrus fruits are very welcome and in demand in the market, which gives them advantages to work. Although, it is difficult to sow and care for the land since the products can be burned by the hot weather or be eaten by insects. This is her fourth loan, she has not had any problem with payments. Teodora will invest in the purchase of insecticides and fertilizers for her citrus field.

Translated from Spanish by Helen Smith, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase insecticides and fertilizers

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda tiene 45 años, vive con su pareja  y sus cuatro hijos. Ella es una mujer que trabaja vendiendo ambulatoriamente algunos dulces en las calles de su comunidad y de las aledañas, actividad que  desarrolla hace un año  para poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de su hogar. El negocio de Yolanda  es rentable si camina  muchos quilómetros para otros  pueblos y vende en las escuelas, pero seria mayor si pudiera  tener una pequeña carretilla donde pueda  llevar sus productos, ya que  cargar  sus bolsitas  de dulces es muy cansado sobretodo por el inmenso calor del día. Es su cuarto préstamo y no ha tenido inconvenientes en sus pagos durante su permanencia con MFP. Yolanda  tiene pensado comprar  cantidad de mercadería y vender mayor diversidad de productos, con el tiempo adquirir una tienda en la ciudad cercana a su comunidad.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 45 years old, lives with her husband and their four children. She is a woman who works selling various sweets on the streets of her community and surrounding areas, an activity that she developed a year ago to help her husband with the expenses of the house. Yolanda's business is profitable if she walks many kilometers to other neighborhoods and sells in the schools, but it would be better if she had a small cart where she could carry her products, since carrying her small bags of sweets is very tiring above all because of the immense heat in the day. This is her fourth loan and she has not had any problems with her payments during her time with MFP. Yolanda is thinking of purchasing a greater quantity of merchandise and selling a greater variety of products, with time she will acquire a store in the city close to her community.

Translated from Spanish by Helen Smith, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase the amount of merchandise she sells

loans.name: Yoni

texts.es: Yoni tiene 26 años, es conviviente, tiene dos hijitos con quienes también vive. Se dedica a la agricultura, en especial a la siembra de maíz, palta y café, actividad que viene realizando  por más de 15 años. Le agrada dedicarse a la agricultura, dentro de ello le gusta la siembra de  maíz y palta,  además estos son rentables  en diversas temporadas, los mercados demandan gran cantidad de producción para trasladarla a los mercados. Lo difícil es la limpieza constante de sus terrenos y cuidarlos de los insectos que dañan los frutos. Es su primer préstamo con MFP. La cantidad solicitada será invertida en la compra de  abonos  y semillas de  maíz.
texts.en:
Yoni is 26 years old, lives with her partner and has two small children who also live with her. She is dedicated to agriculture, particularly planting corn, avocado and coffee, an activity she has done for more than 15 years. She enjoys farming and likes planting corn and avocado, especially because they are profitable in different seasons, the markets demand a great quantity of production to be brought to them. The difficulty is constantly cleaning their lands and taking care of the insects that damage the fruit. This is her first loan with MFP. The amount she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of fertilizer and corn seed.

Translated from Spanish by Helen Smith, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase corn seed and fertilizer

loans.name: Zecy

texts.es: Zecy es una mujer de 43 años, es casada, vive con su pareja y sus cuatro hijos. Se dedica a la  agricultura, produce cítricos, lo cual realiza hace  30 años junto a su esposo. Dentro de su actividad le agrada realizar los mantenimientos de sus terrenos, ya que  lo puede hacer todas las mañanas cuando el calor no es muy fuerte, todo el tiempo y dinero invertido es recompensado, ya que los cítricos son unos frutos de gran demandado en su comunidad, donde  vienen gran cantidad de comerciantes a compra grandes cantidades de  frutas. Lo más difícil es poder encontrar compradores que valoren su trabajo y compren a precios juntos  que  cubran los costos de  producción. Este es su cuarto préstamo, hasta la fecha no ha tenido  problemas de pago en los ciclos anteriores. Zecy desea  invertir en la compra de  abonos y nuevas plantas de  naranja  para sembrar  prontamente.
texts.en:
Zecy is a woman of 43 years. She is married and lives with her partner and their four children. She is dedicated to agriculture. She produces citrus, as she has done with her husband for 30 years. Among their activities she enjoys doing the maintenances of their lands, since she can do it in the mornings when the heat is not very strong. All the time and money invested is rewarded, since citrus fruits are in great demand in their community, where a great many merchants come to purchase large quantities of fruits. The most difficult thing is to find buyers that value their work and buy at prices that cover the costs of production. This is their fourth loan. To date she has not had any payment problems in the previous loan cycles. Zecy wants to invest in the purchase of fertilizer and new orange plants to sow promptly.

Translated from Spanish by Barbara (B) Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and new orange plants to sow

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es: Alejandrina tiene 28 años, vive con su conviviente, aún no tienen hijos. Ella se dedica a apoyar a su esposo en su restaurante, pero le dedica mucho más tiempo al servicio de llamadas telefónicas por celular de forma ambulatoria, esto hace ya 3 años, tiempo en el cual ha adquirido todo el conocimiento necesario para desempeñar muy bien en su trabajo, arrojándole buenas ganancias económicas. A Alejandrina le gusta su trabajo, ya que le da cierta libertad el realizarlo, movilizándose de un lugar a otro ofreciendo el servicio de llamadas. Lo más dificultoso es tener que soportar el calor que hace durante el día y el imperante frío que hace por las tardes en esta zona del país. Alejandrina se encuentra en el primer préstamo con Microfinanzas PRISMA. Con el dinero solicitado quiere comprar otro equipo celular para mejorar  sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Alejandrina is 28 years old. She lives with her partner. They do not have children yet. She is dedicated to supporting her husband in his restaurant, but dedicates a lot more time to a cell telephone calling service that she sells on foot. She has been selling this service for 3 years, in which time she has acquired all the necessary knowledge to perform very well in her work, earning herself a good profit. Alejandrina likes her work, since it gives her a certain liberty as she does it, moving from one place to another offering the calling service. The most difficult thing is to have to bear the heat that occurs during the day and the prevailing cold that occurs in the afternoons in this zone of the country. Alejandrina is requesting her first loan with Microfinanzas PRISM. With the requested money she wants to buy another cell phone to improve her income.

Translated from Spanish by Barbara (B) Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy another cell phone for her calling service.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana tiene 28 años, vive con su pareja y sus dos hijos. Se dedica al negocio de servicio de llamadas por celular desde hace 3 años, apoyando a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Lo que le gusta a Ana de su trabajo es el tener la libertad de disponer de su tiempo cuando trabaja, ya que para ella lo fundamental es la atención de sus hijos, este trabajo le permite cuidarlos y trabajar al mismo tiempo, teniendo a dos jóvenes que trabajan con los celulares que Ana adquirió. El negocio va progresando y es así que Ana quiere crecer, es por eso que recurre a nuestra ayuda para hacer de sus sueños realidad. Ana se encuentra en el primer préstamo con Microfinanzas Prisma. Con el dinero que solicita comprara más equipos para ponerlos a trabajar, y así lograr mejores ingresos e incrementar su negocio.
texts.en:
Ana is 28 years old. She lives with her partner and their two children. She has been dedicated to a cell phone calling service business for 3 years, supporting her husband with the expenses of the home. What Ana likes about her work is to have the freedom to choose the time when she works, since for her the fundamental thing is the care of her children. This work permits her to take care of them and to work at the same time, having two youths that work with the cell phone that Ana acquired. The business is progressing and so Ana wants to grow it. That is why she resorts to our aid to make of her dreams reality. Ana is seeking her first loan with Microfinanzas Prism. With the money that she is requesting, she will buy more equipment to put to work, and thus to achieve a better income and increase her business.

Translated from Spanish by Barbara (B) Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy another cell phone for her calling service

loans.name: Hermogenes

texts.es: Hermógenes tiene 30 años, es soltero, vive independientemente en la casa de sus padres. Se dedica a la elaboración de prendas tejidas a máquina desde hace ya 8 años, gracias a lo aprendido del negocio familiar, ahora él de forma independiente trabaja para solventar todos sus gastos. El negocio va bien, vendiendo gran cantidad de chompas por pedido, a él le gusta elaborarlas y poder satisfacer las necesidades de su clientela, pero muchas veces los diferentes puntos y trazos le resultan complicados de realizar, siendo esto mínimo a comparación de todas las gratificaciones que le da su trabajo que cada día crece más y más. Hermógenes se encuentra en el primer préstamo con Microfinanzas Prisma. Con el dinero solicitado comprará mayor cantidad de lana, de diferentes calidades y colores para elaborar sus tan bonitas prendas y así hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Hermógenes is 30 years old and single. While he lives in his parents' home, he is responsible for his own expenses. For the last eight years he has made machine-woven clothing, having learned this skill in his family business. He is now able to earn enough to support himself. His business is going well and he receives many orders for his sweaters. He enjoys making them and being able to satisfy his clients' needs, but often the different patterns and designs are complicated to create. However, this is a minor frustration compared to the gratification he receives from having a business that grows more and more each day. This is Hermógenes's first loan from Microfinanzas Prisma. He will use the money to buy wool of various qualities and colors to make his beautiful garments and will thereby continue to develop his business.

Translated from Spanish by Kris Vickery, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of wool in different qualities and colors

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana tiene 61 años, es soltera y vive sola, ya que no tuvo hijos. Se dedica a la venta de golosinas de forma ambulatoria en su triciclo, en el cual ofrece una cantidad variada de galletas, golosinas, gaseosas, etc. Ella realiza su trabajo desde hace 30 años para poder cubrir sus necesidades económicas, gustándole mucho, ya que es su única fuente de distracción, le agrada interactuar con los niños y la gente que compra sus productos. Lo más difícil de su trabajo es el tener que permanecer durante casi todo el día sentada ofreciendo sus golosinas, pero a esto ella ya se ha acostumbrado, viendo más bien las cosas positivas que le trae su trabajo. Este es su segundo préstamo con Microfinanzas Prisma. Con el dinero que solicita comprará mayor cantidad de golosinas para aumentar la venta de su negocio y así poder asegurar su vejez.
texts.en:
Juana is 61 years old, single, and lives alone since she never had children. She sells candy and snacks from a 3-wheeled cart. She offers a wide variety of cookies, candies, soft drinks, etc. She has been doing this work for thirty years in order to be able to cover her living expenses. She really enjoys it, and it is her only form of entertainment. It makes her very happy to interact with the people who buy from her, especially the children. The hardest part of her work is that she has to stay seated in one place almost all day while she sells her merchandise, but she has gotten used to this and stays focused on all of the positive things that her work brings her. This is her second loan with Microfinanzas Prisma. With the money, Juana will purchase more candy and snacks to increase sales and thereby enable her to save for her old age.

Translated from Spanish by Kris Vickery, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of candy and snacks to increase sales

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: Lidia tiene 34 años, es soltera, vive sola ya que no tuvo hijos. Es una mujer muy  trabajadora que se dedica desde hace ya 7 años a la venta de artículos de plástico, como ganchos  de ropa, jaboneras, etc, para poder salir adelante. Le agrada salir a vender de forma ambulatoria, ya que le permite trabajar al aire libre y poder interactuar libremente con sus clientes, a los cuales convence de adquirir sus productos con gran desenvolvimiento y persuasión. Lidia vende gran cantidad de mercadería al día, lo que le hace pensar en hacer crecer su negocio comprando más mercadería, pero no deja de ser difícil el tener que permanecer durante  la mayor parte del día soportando las inclemencias del clima, que no es todos los días, pero que cuando sucede la obligan a tener que retirarse antes del horario que ella misma se ha establecido. Lidia se encuentra en el primer préstamo con Microfinanzas Prisma. Con el dinero solicitado comprará más cantidad de ganchos, entre otros artículos de plástico, para aumentar su mercadería y por ende sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Lidia is 34 years old, she is single, and she lives alone since she does not have children. She is a hard working woman that has dedicated the past 7 years to the sales of plastic items, such as coat hangers and soap dishes, etc, to pull through. She likes going out and selling door to door, especially because she can work outdoor and she can interact as she pleases with her client, convincing her clients to buy her products using a good position and persuasion. Lidia sells great quantities of merchandise every day, which makes her think of making her business grow by purchasing more merchandise. But it is always difficult to stay outside for the greater part of the day, facing inclement weather. Although bad weather is does not happen every day but when it does occur she is forced to end business early, a schedule she has set for herself. Lidia has her first loan with Microfinanzas Primas (Kiva Field Partner). With the funds she has requested she will purchase in greater quantity hangers, and other plastic products to increase her merchandise and in consequence, her income.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase the merchandise she sells

loans.name: Magda

texts.es: Magda tiene 36 años, es viuda, vive independientemente en casa de su familia. Es una mujer muy fuerte, a la cual le gustan mucho los niños, lamentablemente no ha podido tener uno propio, ya que su esposo falleció, teniendo que dedicarse a lo que venia realizando desde hace 10 años, la venta de joyas. Siempre se ha desenvuelto muy bien en el negocio y la venta de joyas le arroja buenos ingresos, los cuales le permiten pensar en expandir su negocio, pero ella necesita ayuda es por eso que recurre a nuestra ayuda para realizar todas sus metas. Magda se encuentra en el 2do préstamo con Microfinanzas Prisma. Con el dinero solicitado comprará más cantidad de joyas para poder vender, y así aumentar sus ingresos económicos, de antemano ella agradece tu gentil ayuda.
texts.en:
Magda is 36-years old and is single, living with her family. She is a strong woman, who very much likes babies. Unfortunately, she does not own property, since her husband passed away. For the last 10-years, Magda has dedicated herself to the sales of jewelry. She has always been able to develop good business and the sales of jewelry has brought in a good profit; so much so that she is now considering expanding the business, but she needs our help to realizes all her goals. Magda is into her second loan with Microfinanzas Prisma and with these funds she will buy an inventory of jewelry to sell. She knows that this will greatly increase her income and thanks you in advance for your graciously helping her.

Translated from Spanish by Jenson Abraham, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase her inventory of jewelery for sales

loans.name: Magda

texts.es: Magda tiene 20 años, es soltera, vive sola en un cuarto que alquiló. Es una joven que ha trabajado desde hace 6 años en la venta de joyas que adquiere de revistas, trayéndolas desde otros lugares, para venderlas en la ciudad de Juliaca. Le gusta su trabajo, ya que se trata de ayudar las mujeres a sentirse más bonitas de lo que ya son, con los productos que ella ofrece, ella piensa que su trabajo es muy dignificante, ya que le permite sentirse útil y tiene deseos de crecer y superarse mucho más. Magda se encuentra en el primer préstamo con Microfinanzas Prisma. Con el dinero solicitado comprará mayor cantidad de joyas para poder mejorar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Magda, 20, is single and lives by herself in a rented room. Magda is a young woman who has been selling jewelry for six years. She buys jewelry from a catalog, and brings it from other places to sell in the city of Juliaca. What she likes about her job is that she is helping women feel prettier wearing the jewelry that she sells. Her job makes her feel useful and worthy. Magda's goal is to make her business grow and to have a much better life. This is Magda's first loan through Kiva partner Microfinanzas Prisma. The loan will be used to purchase more jewelry and improve her sales and profits.

Translated from Spanish by Maria B., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increasing the amount of jewelry to sell

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es: Vicente tiene 37 años, es soltero, vive solo ya que no tuvo hijos. Es protesista dental, se dedica hace 9 años a la atención en su pequeña clínica, la cual  gracias a su gran esfuerzo y gran atención ha aumentado el número de sus clientes, los cuales asisten fielmente a su consulta. El negocio es bueno, pero la gran dedicación que el le brinda a su trabajo a veces suelen agotarlo, haciendo que no pueda abastecerse para la atención de toda la clientela. Pero a pesar de los pequeños inconvenientes Vicente quiere sacar adelante su negocio,  es por eso que recurre a nuestra ayuda para hacer posibles sus metas. Vicente se encuentra en el primer préstamo con Microfinanzas Prisma. Con el dinero quiere comprar mayor cantidad de material dental para la mejor atención a su clientela y si es posible contratar a una ayudante para desenvolverse mejor en la atención.
texts.en:
Vicente, 37, is single and lives by himself. He is a dental prosthetist. He has had a small office for nine years, which he built with great effort. Little by little he has built his practice, and now he has a large number of patients thanks to the care he gives them. Business is good, but the Vicente's dedication to his patients leaves him with little time to rest, and all the time he spends at work is not even enough to see all his patients. Despite the small inconveniences, Vicente wants to make his business grow, and this wish brings him to request our help. This is Vicente's first loan with Kiva partner Microfinanzas Prisma. The loan will be used to purchase more dental materials, and possibly to hire an assistant to provide more and better care to his patients.

Translated from Spanish by Maria B., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing dental materials for his job

loans.name: Cerenia

texts.en:
Mrs. Cerenia B.'s husband is a factory worker in faraway city of Manila and is seldom able to stay with his wife and daughter in Tudela, Misamis Occidental. Despite the distance their family relationship is still strong and harmonious.

Cerenia is an active Center Chief of one of the groups organized by PMPC in her village. She was able to manage her Center well. She is known as a good dressmaker in their village and she also engages in buying and selling silver jewelry  which her husband brings from Manila from time to time.

In the more than 3 years that she has been a member of PMPC, Cerenia has appreciated wholeheartedly the programs and services of the Coop. She has been able to manage her customers well. Because of customer demand and Christmas fast approaching she is in need of additional capital in the amount of PHP 50,000 to purchase more clothing materials and silver jewelry for her thriving business.

Cerenia B. dreams that someday she will be able to put a tailoring shop in the city and her husband will soon come home and just help her in her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional clothing materials and silver jewelry to sell

loans.name: Ynes

texts.es: Ynes tiene 27 años, es soltera y vive con su familia. Se dedica a la atención de su inmobiliaria, la cual ha sacado adelante tras mucho esfuerzo, ya que ha venido dedicándole 3 años de su vida, para que esta logre los resultados deseados. Le gusta su trabajo, ya que sabe que mediante él podrá progresar. A pesar de su juventud y poca experiencia Ynes es muy madura y administra muy bien su negocio. Lo más difícil es tener que dedicarle casi todo el día al trabajo, ya que no puede darse el lujo de descuidar su trabajo, pero ella sabe que esas son pequeñas cosas a comparación de todo lo que le brinda su trabajo. Ynes se encuentra en el primer préstamo con Microfinanzas Prisma. Con el dinero solicitado quiere implementar mejor su oficina, para brindarles una mejor atención a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ynes, 27, single and lives with her parents. She has a real estate business, which she started three years ago, and has grown with Ynes' hard work and dedication. Ynes likes her job; she knows it is a path to a better life. Despite her youth and little experience, Ynes is a very mature woman and manages her business very well. The only difficult aspect of her job is that she must spend most of the day at the office as she cannot afford the luxury of a short work day. But Ynes knows that these are small sacrifices when compared to all the god things that her job brings. This is Ynes' first loan with Kiva partner Microfinanzas Prisma. The loan will be used to refurbish her office to offer a better service to her clients.

Translated from Spanish by Maria B., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Improve her office to provide a better service

loans.name: Yudit

texts.es: Yudit es soltera, tiene 25 años y vive sola en un cuarto que alquiló. Se dedica a la venta de joyas para vivir, ella ha venido realizando este trabajo desde hace 6 años, en los cuales ha venido creciendo poco a poco con su negocio. Le gusta su trabajo porque le permite tener la libertad de cuando realizarlo, como ella dice, “es su propio jefe”  y dispone de cuándo y a qué horas trabajar, es por eso que a veces trabaja hasta muy tarde y otras cuando tiene algo que hacer puede disponer de no realizarlo, pero solo en emergencias, ya que ella es muy disciplinada en cuanto a su horario. Yudit se encuentra en el primer préstamo con Microfinanzas Prisma. Con el dinero solicitado quiere viajar a traer joyas del país de Bolivia, ya está muy cerca y tienen bonitos modelos, y luego comercializar en Juliaca y así mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Yudit, 25, is single and lives by herself in a rented room. She has been selling jewelry for six years; her business grown little by little. She likes her business because she is her own boss and she can decide when and how long to work. Sometime she works until late, and other times she has the option of not working, but this happens only in emergencies, as Yudit is very disciplined with her work schedule. This is Yudit's first loan through Kiva partner Microfinanzas Prisma. The loan will be used to purchase more jewelry in Bolivia, which is close and offers nice designs. Yudit will sell the jewelry in Juliaca and improve her sales and profits.

Translated from Spanish by Maria B., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing more jewelry in Bolivia

loans.name: Yecica

texts.es: Yecica tiene 37 años, es conviviente, tiene dos hijos menores y vive en la casa de sus padres. Años atrás se dedicaba a sus quehaceres del hogar, pero ahora, hace un año está trabajando en el cafetín de la escuela de su barrio, por ello que a diario prepara el menú tanto para los docentes y alumnos de la escuela, esta actividad a ella le agrada mucho porque le genera ganancias a su economía, más que otras actividades, además que a ella le gusta estar en contacto con la gente, solo que a veces  le es dificultoso  cuando le falta ayuda para atender a sus clientes infantes,  en horas del recreo es donde más trabaja, muchas veces los niños se llevan sin pagar las golosinas.  Este es su 5to préstamo con Microfinanzas Prisma, en todo este tiempo ha sido puntual en sus pagos. Con el dinero va a comprar una refrigeradora para que pueda realizar chupetes de hielo y vender a los niños.
texts.en:
Yecica, 37, lives with her common-law husband and two children in her parents' house. She used to be a homemaker, but a year ago she started working in the school cafeteria. She prepares the daily menu for the teachers and students. Yecica enjoys this activity because of the good profits it generates, and because she likes to be in contact with people. What she finds most difficult is that she does not have an assistant, especially during recess, when sometimes the students take candy without paying. This is Yecica's fifth loan through Kiva partner Microfinanzas Prisma. She has always made her payments on time. Yecica will use the loan to purchase a freezer to make ice popsicles and sell them.

Translated from Spanish by Maria B., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing a freezer to keep ice popsicles

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana tiene 33 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 2 hijos. Ella es profesora de primaria, en horas de la mañana trabaja en un colegio particular  y en horas de la tarde se dedica a realizar manualidades para diversos eventos, dependiendo de las campañas y las épocas en que se realicen diversas actividades, ella esta ahí presente, de pasada les da trabajo a sus hermanas en la producción de sus manualidades, cuando tiene grandes pedidos. Esta actividad la realiza hace 20 años y le agrada mucho, por ello que en vacaciones viaja a Lima para capacitarse en este arte y regresa ofreciendo novedades a sus clientes. Este es su préstamo nº5 con MFP, ha sido puntual en sus pagos. Con el dinero comprará materiales para sus diversas manualidades.
texts.en:
Ana, 33, lives with her common-law husband and their two children. She is an elementary school teacher and works at a private school in the mornings. In the afternoons, she makes crafts for different occasions. No matter the season, Ana is always crafting and when she has large orders to fill, she hires her sisters to help. She has had this business for 20 years, ans she enjoys it very much. She travels to Lima when school is out to take arts and crafts classes, and she always comes back with new things to offer. This is Ana's fifth loan through Kiva partner Microfinanzas Prisma. She has made her payments on time. With this loan, Ana will purchase materials to make different crafts.

Translated from Spanish by Maria B., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing materials for crafts

loans.name: Ellen

texts.en:
Mrs. Ellen D. S. is  37 years old, married with 1 child.  Her husband used to be an Overseas Filipino Worker (OFW) but he decided to come home and stay with his family. It was then that they started a mini grocery store located on the national high way of Lupagan, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. 

For more than two years now, the store has been doing great. Ellen's husband cultivates land for additional income.
 
Ellen joined Paglaum MPC as she admired the programs and services that the cooperative offered.

Paglaum MPC is her new partner in business. She is now requesting a loan in the amount of $1025 as additional capital for  her business. The loan will be used to purchase additional grocery stock for her mini grocery store.

Ellen's dream is to build a one stop shop grocery store and to use the proceeds from the business to send her son to school for a bachelor's degree.

loans.use: To purchase additional grocery stock

loans.name: Ciria

texts.es: Ciria tiene 55 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive acompañada de sus hijos, que ya son adultos y una nieta. Desde hace mucho tiempo se ha dedicado al venta de diversos productos, hace 12 años atrás ella tenia un kiosco y ahí vendía golosinas, café y pan, después se dedicó a la vender ropa usada en la calle en lo cual le fue muy bien, por ello hasta ahora realiza esa actividad, pero ahora también tiene una pequeña bodega en su propia casa desde hace 2 años, en lo que también le va muy bien, y le es muy rentable. Ahora tiene en mente incrementar más su bodega, para que cuando esté anciana se dedique solo a ella. Este es su 5to préstamo con MFP, viene pagando puntual sus cuotas. Con el dinero solicitado incrementará la mercadería de su bodega, sobre todo en la línea de dulces.
texts.en:
Ciria is 55-years old and is a single mom who lives with her children. Her grand-daughter and adult children all live with her. For some time now she had dedicated herself to selling various products. Twelve years ago, she owned a kiosk and sold candy, coffee and bread and then decided to sell used clothes as a street vendor and it is going well. She currently performs this activity, but for the last 2-years she also runs a small shop out of her house and that too is going well and is very profitable. Now, Ciria has it in mind to expand the shop so that when she is old she will be solely dedicated to it. This is her fifth loan with MFP and she will pay her dues timely. With these funds she will increase her stock of merchandise for all types of candy.

Translated from Spanish by Jenson Abraham, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her shop

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena tiene 50 años, es viuda hace un año, ahora vive tan solo con su nieta. Toda su vida se ha dedicado al negocio D. diversos productos comestibles, hace 10 años atrás se dedicaba a llevar miel y café a la ciudad capital, pero desD. hace 7 años a puesto una bodeguita en su domicilio, por ello ya no viaja con frecuencia, en su bodega a implementado más la línea D. golosinas, para ella le es más rentable a comparación D. otras mercaderías, las golosinas son D. menor inversión y le deja ganar mucho más que los abarrotes. La dificultad que siente es que no le alcanza el dinero para surtir las galletas que les piden sus clientes. Este es su 5to préstamo con MFP, demostrando puntualidad en sus pagos. Con el dinero solicitado va a comprar más galletas D. diversas marcas que le permiten surtir su negocio.
texts.en:
Elena is 50-years old, widowed a year ago and currently lives with her grand-daughter. All her life she has dedicated herself to the business of various edible products. 10-years ago she started carrying honey and coffee to the capital city, but for the last 7-years she runs a small shop out of her home.

For Elena, she doesn’t have to travel much and her shop showcases an array of sweets that are rather cost-effective in comparison to other goods. The sweets require a minimal investment, but earn much more than groceries. The challenge that Elena currently faces is that she doesn’t have the money to bring the cookies that her clients are asking for. This is the fifth loan request with MFP, which evidently shows how punctual Elena is with her payments. With these funds she will purchases more cookies of various brands that she will present at her business.

Translated from Spanish by Jenson Abraham, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase her stock of merchandise for her store

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es: Elsa tiene 34 años, es conviviente, tiene cuatro hijos que vive con ellos y están estudiando. Su esposo es mecánico de motos, tiene un taller en su casa, desde hace un año ella se está dedicando a administrar el motocarro que poseen. La moto trabaja con un chofer contratado de 6.00 am. hasta las 8.00pm (en transporte de pasajeros) Elsa se dedica a revisar que cada vez que llegue la moto esté en perfectas condiciones y si le falta alguna pieza ella se responsabiliza. Este negocio le es muy rentables, ya que le genera un ingreso adicional a su economía. Este es su 5to préstamo con MicroFinanzas Prisma, durante todo este tiempo ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y puntual en sus cuotas. Con el dinero solicitado va a comprar repuestos para su moto, los que le costarán un aproximado de S/. 1.500.00.
texts.en:
Elsa is 34-years old and has 4 children who live with her and are currently studying. Her husband is a automobile mechanic , who has a workshop in their home. It has been a year now that Elsa has been maintaining the taxi cab that they own. The cab is used by hired driver from 6 AM to 8 PM for the purpose of transporting passengers. Elsa’s job is to inspect the cab each time to insure it’s in perfect condition and if parts are missing that people are held accountable. This business is very profitable as it generates additional income. This is the fifth loan with Microfinanzas Prisma and each time Elsa has shown herself to be very responsible and punctual with her payments. With these funds she will buy spare parts for the cab which should cost approximately S/. 1,500.00

Translated from Spanish by Jenson Abraham, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy spare parts for the taxi cab

loans.name: Fidel

texts.es: Fidel tiene 28 años, está conviviendo con su esposa, en la casa de sus padres, no tiene hijos aun. Desde los 12 años ayudaba a la chacra a cultivar sus tierras, a el no le agrada mucho la chacra, siembra por que no tiene otra actividad en qué ocuparse, pero si le gustaría tener un negocio en la ciudad, es con esa finalidad que está sembrando, para ahorrar  y tener, con el tiempo, su anhelado tienda. Comenta que sembrar es muy dificultoso porque no se sabe si se va a cosechar bien o si cae el hielo se pierde todo su cultivo, es por ello que no le agrada. Es su primer préstamo con MFP. Con el dinero comprará fertilizantes para abonar sus chacras de cultivo de papa, con la esperanza de que produzca muy bien.
texts.en:
Fidel is 28-years old and lives with his spouse in his parent’s house and they have no children yet. For the last 12-years he has been helping to cultivate the land on the farm. He doesn’t really like working on the ranch, but he doesn’t have any other activities to preoccupy himself, though he would like to have a business in the city. It’s for this purpose that he sows seeds on the farm, so as to save and own his own shop one day. Fidel says that planting is very difficult because no one knows if they will reap a good harvest; if ice should befall the land then the entire crop is lost – and for this he is unhappy. This is his first loan with MFP and with these funds he will purchase fertilizer to grow potatoes with the hope of producing a very good crop.

Translated from Spanish by Jenson Abraham, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy fertilizer to grow potatoes

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: Marina tiene 44 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene tres hijos quienes alegran su existencia. Desde hace 8 años exactamente se dedica a la venta de comida y jugos, pero hace 12 años atrás que tiene una bodega a la cual le dedica mayor tiempo y la cual le genera mayores ingresos económicos. Le es muy rentable la venta de comida también,  pero dice que corre el riesgo que a veces se queda con el menú y entonces pierde, por ello que ha visto por conveniente incrementar más su bodega y dedicarse de lleno a ella. La dificultad es que cuando necesita salir de compras, no  tiene a quien dejar y en ese tiempo pierde clientes. Este es su 5to préstamo con Microfinanzas Prisma. Con el dinero solicitado surtirá su bodega y va comprar panteones para la campaña navideña.
texts.en:
Marina is 44 years old, she is married common-law, and she has 3 children who bring joy to her life. For exactly the past 8 years she has been selling fruit and juices. But it was 12 years aog that she her convenience store, to which she invests most of her time and it generates the most income. It is very profitable to sell foods also, but she says that she runs the risk that sometimes she doesn't sell out all the food and loses money. But she has seen that it would be best to expand her convenience store and dedicate her time completely there. The most difficult part is when she needs to go out to make her purchases. She doesn't have any staff and during that time she loses clients. This is her 5th loan with Microfinanzas Prisma (Kiva Field Partner). With the funds she has requested she will restock her convenience store and she will purchase holiday items for the Christmas season.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase the merchandise in her convenience store.

loans.name: Mrs. Samouern Sok Village Bank Group

texts.en:
The Village Bank loA. group consists of ten members who live in Phsar village in Kampong Chhnang Province. Mrs. Samouern S. is the Village Bank president. She owns a small stand where she sells Khmer noodles to villagers and visitors. Since this business is going well, she wants to expand it; thus, she decided to ask for a loA. to add to her saving to buy more Khmer noodles. Her husband, Mr. Kim Samleang, is a farmer who owns a small piece of land on which he cultivates rice.

Mrs. Samouern S. is 47 years old and the mother of six children, one of whom is a driver for a company. Four others are enrolled in the local school and the youngest one is too young to work or study.

This is a group loA., some portions of which will be paid back in installments while other portions are paid back in one lump sum at the end of the term. These members are not required to pay any principal on the loA. until the very end of the loA. term.

End-of-term loans are AMK’s main product because it is the best way to help Cambodia’s poor. It allows them to repay portions of the principal whenever they are financially able to. Most clients start to make their payments many months before the end of the loA. term. Almost all of AMK’s clients make their payments on time. AMK has a delinquency rate of only 0.09 percent, and AMK has a default rate of zero on Kiva loans.

loans.use: To buy items for several small businesses

loans.name: Mirtha

texts.es: Mirtha tiene 43 años Ella es ama de casa desde que se casó, se  dedica al cuidado de sus hijos  y solo los domingos se dedica a preparar comida y la vender cervezas, esta actividad la realiza hace 11 años atrás, porque esta labor le agrada, y es mas, su sazón es muy agradable, tanto que el día que no prepara nada, sus clientes le reclaman. Le es muy rentable este negocio, le deja un margen muy considerable para sus ingresos, lo que le es muy dificultoso es no tener un lugar apropiado para que pueda poner un restaurante en su casa. Está muy agradecida por el apoyo de su IMF., es casada, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos quienes están en la etapa de estudios. Este es su 5to préstamo con MFP, cumpliendo puntualmente con sus pagos. Con el dinero comprará víveres y utensilios para que en el futuro abra su restaurante, pretende invertir un aproximado de S/. 1.000
texts.en:
Mirtha is 43 years old. She is a stay at home mom since she got married and she dedicates her time to caring for her children. Only on Sundays she spends her day preparing foods and selling beers. This is a business she has been running for the past 11 years because she loves her work, and because her cooking is so good, so much so that when she doesn't make any food, her clients complain. Her business is very successful, giving her a good margin of profit. What is difficult for her is not having an adequate space where she could set up a restaurant in her own home. She is very grateful to her IMF for their support. She is married and lives with her husband and two children, currently going to school. This is her 5th loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner), always being on time with her payments. With the funds she will purchase ingredients and utensils for when she will open her restaurant. She plans to invest approximately S/1000.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase ingredients and kitchen utensils.

loans.name: Zoraida

texts.es: Zoraida tiene 24 años de edad, es conviviente, vive con su esposo y su hija. Su esposo trabaja en la mina, en horas de la mañana ella se dedica sus quehaceres del hogar, pero en horas de la tarde vende productos de belleza a sus clientes que son las mujeres. Empezó a vender estos productos por recomendación de una amiga, quien la motivó a que ingresara a este negocio hace 8 meses, hasta el momento le esta yendo muy bien porque tiene sus clientas muy puntuales en sus pagos, lo difícil para ella que tiene una nena de 9 meses y eso le dificulta caminar y promocionar sus productos, está esperando a que crezca su hija para que trabaje con mayor comodidad. Este es su 5to préstamo con Microfinanzas Prisma. El dinero será invertido en la compra de más productos de belleza, para incrementar su stock y así le deje un margen de ganancia  mucho mayor.
texts.en:
Zoraida is 24 years old, she is married common-law, and she lives with her husband and daughter. Her husband works in the mine. In the morning hours she does all the house work and in the afternoons she sells beauty products to her clients, all of whom are women. She started selling these products following a friend's suggestion, she motivated her to invest in this business for 8 months. Up to date it has gone very well because she has good clients who are always on time with their payments. The hardest part ofr her is that she has a little 9-mohth old baby, making it hard for her to work and promote her products. She is waiting for her little girl to grow up so that she could work with greater ease. This is the 5th loan she has with Microfinanzas Prisma (Kiva Field Partner). The funds will be invested in the purchase of more beauty products, to supplement her stock and to increase her profit margin.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase the quantities of beauty products she sells.

loans.name: Oun

texts.en: Mrs. Oun C. is 39 years old. She is a farmer and also raises pigs. She started this work in her village over 7 years ago. She lives in Pursat Province and takes care of four children, all of whom are in school. Her husband, Mr. Kheav Chinda, 39, is a local farmer. Oun hopes to acquire more piglets to raises because it is the main source of income for her family. Hence, she needs a loan of $800 to buy piglets and to purchase a cow to help plow a field.

loans.use: To buy piglets and a cow

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Norma tiene 25 años, es conviviente, de esa relación conyugal tiene tres hijos y uno en camino. En horas de la mañana se dedica a su casa y cuidar sus hijos, hace 3 años ella y su esposo compraron un motocarro para que su esposo trabajara en transporte de pasajeros, dice que les va muy bien, diario le deja un aproximado de 20 soles, por lo cual han visto que le es muy rentable. Solo es muy difícil cuando la moto tiene que entrar en reparación y deben comprar nuevas piezas para que rinda como debe ser, ahora ellos están pensando en comprar otra moto y hacerla trabajar con un chofer y esto les de un ingreso adicional. Es su 5to préstamo con MFP. Con el dinero solicitado comprará los repuestos para su motocarro, los que les costarán un aproximado de S/.1.500.00
texts.en:
Norma is 25 years old, she is common-law married, and from this union she has three children and one on the way. In the morning hours she tends to her house and cares for her children. Three years ago she and her husband purchase a motorcycle cab, her husband is the driver providing transport to passengers. She says that it's going very well, earning approximately 20 nuevos soles daily, which they have considered as very successful. It is very difficult when the motorcycle has to go in for repairs and when they have to buy new parts to get it to run as it should. They are thinking about buying a second one and hire a driver to keep it running, to give them a second income. It is her 5th loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner). With the funds requested she will purchase spare parts for the motorcycle cab, which will cost approximately S/.1500.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase spare parts for the motorcycle cab.

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es: Rocio tiene 36 años de edad, es conviviente con su esposo y tiene un hijo, vive en casa de su suegra. Hace tres años puso un locutorio de llamadas telefónicas en servicio de la comunidad, en vista que por su barrio no había ese tipo de servicio. Años anteriores trabajaba en el cafetín de una escuela, pero dice que el locutorio le es más rentable y le permite estar en casa para cuidar  a sus hijos menores. Su deseo es  incrementar más cabinas, para así poder generarse más ingresos, ella muestra gratitud por haberle facilitado ese préstamo y hacer realidad su sueño de crecer. Es su 5to préstamo con Microfinanzas Prisma. Con el dinero solicitado va incrementar más cabinas para su negocio y generarse mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Rocio is 36 years old. She lives with her husband and son in her mother-in-law's house. Three years ago, she created a "telephone shop" ** to serve her community, because before, her neighborhood did not have this type of service available. In years past, Rocio worked in a school cafeteria, but she says that the phone shop is more profitable, and it allows her to stay at home and care for her child. She wants to add more telephone booths to increase her revenue, and so she is grateful for this loan and the ability to realize her dream. This is her fifth loan with Kiva partner Microfinanzas Prisma. With the requested loan, she will add more phone booths to her business and increase her revenues. ** Translator's note: A "locutorio" is a "telephone shop," and it appears to be a place filled with telephone booths, sometimes offering cheaper calling rates than are available by other means.

Translated from Spanish by Olivia Engkvist, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Add booths to her phone shop

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es: Sandra tiene 22 años, es conviviente, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Hace 5 años que se dedica a venta de productos de belleza, después de cumplir sus actividades de ama de casa, le gusta estar en contacto con la gente, por ello que ha visto por conveniente ser promotora de productos de belleza, ya que le es muy rentable y le deja márgenes de ganancia muy considerables, sobre todo  la línea de perfumes. En horas de la tarde de dedica a ir de casa en casa para que pueda ofrecer sus productos y así de a poco piensa incrementar sus productos, lo difícil para ella es que no cuenta con dinero suficiente para comprar en grandes cantidades sus productos de belleza y pueda ganar mucho más. Es su 5to préstamo con MicroFinanzas Prisma. El dinero será invertido en la compra de productos de belleza de varias líneas de cosméticos.
texts.en:
Sandra is 22 years old and lives with her partner and their two children. For five years she has sold beauty products. After fulfilling her daily responsibilities as a homemaker she enjoys getting out among people, and so selling beauty products is well-suited to her. The business is very lucrative and provides considerable profit margins, especially the line of perfumes. She spends her afternoons going from house to house to sell her products and her success has made her want to offer more items for sale. Unfortunately, she does not have enough money to purchase the quantities of products that would enable her to earn more. This is her fifth loan from Microfinanzas Prisma. The money will be invested in buying beauty products from various cosmetic lines.

Translated from Spanish by Kris Vickery, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase the variety of beauty products for sale

loans.name: Mrs. Saron Sun Village Bank Group

texts.en:
The Village Bank loan group consists of ten members who live in Phsar village in Kampong Chhnang Province. Mrs. Saron S. is the Village Bank president. She is a 28-year-old bamboo seller. She has a lot of customers and demand is very high, which is why Mrs. Saron S. has decided to ask for a loan to buy more bamboo to re-sell. She hopes to improve her business by providing better service to her customers. Her husband, Mr. Klang Sunheang, is a teacher in the local school. Mrs. Saron S. has two children who are too young to work or study.

This is a group loan with two end-of-term loans and eight monthly payment loans. The end-of-term members are not required to pay any principal on the loan until the very end of the loan term. End-of-term (EoT) loans are AMK’s main product because they are most beneficial to Cambodia’s poor. Such loans allow them to repay portions of the principal whenever they are financially able. Most clients start to make their payments many months before the end of the loan term. Almost all of AMK’s client make their payments on time. AMK has a delinquency rate of only 0.09% and a default rate of 0% on Kiva loans.

loans.use: To buy more bamboo to re-sell.

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es: Teofila tiene 48 años, es conviviente con su segundo compromiso, vive con su hija de 24 años que es soltera y le ayuda a sus labores. Desde muy niña ha estada en la actividad de la chacra, y después se dedicó a pastear su ganado. Hace 3  años decidió abrir una bodeguita, sus vecinos son los clientes que consumen sus productos, pero por falta de dinero no está muy surtida su tienda. Esta actividad de comprar y vender productos y estar en contar en contacto directo con la gente a ella le agrada mucho, por ello ha decidido hacer pastar sus carneros con pastores, y se dedica a su negocio, ya que también lo ve muy rentable y menos cansado que la agricultura y el pastar carneros, su dificultad es que no tiene suficiente mercadería para surtir su negocio. Este es su segundo préstamo con MFP,  no ha tenido dificultad de pago. Con todo el dinero que solicita va a incrementar los productos de primera necesidad y de ese modo poder tener muy bien surtida su bodega.
texts.en:
Teofila is 48 years old and lives with her fiancé and her 24-year-old daughter who helps her with her business. Since she was very young she has worked on a farm and she later began to raise cattle. Three years ago she decided to open a small grocery store and her neighbors are her customers. Unfortunately, she does not have enough money to fully stock her store. She really enjoys buying and selling products and being in direct contact with people, so she has decided to have others look after her cattle so that she can devote herself fully to the store. This is a good decision because the store is more profitable and less tiring than farming and cattle raising. But, the problem is that she does not have sufficient merchandise for her business. This is her second loan from Microfinanzas PRISMA, and she has not had a problem in repaying the first. With this loan she will increase her supply of basic foodstuffs and in this way will keep her store well-stocked.

Translated from Spanish by Kris Vickery, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase the merchandise offered in her store

loans.name: Vantha

texts.en: Mrs. Vantha K. is 23 years old and lives in Prey Chuor village in Takeo Province. She makes a living breeding pigs. Because her business is doing well, she wants to expand it with a loan to buy more piglets. She will also use some money from the loan to buy a cow to begin cow breeding. She hopes to increase income and improve her family's life and living conditions. Her husband, Mr. Hein Born, is a motorbike taxi driver. Mrs. Vantha K. and her husband have a two-year-old child who is too young to work or study.

loans.use: To buy more piglets and a cow

loans.name: Vorn

texts.en: Mrs. Vorn S. lives in Prey Chuor village in Takeo Province, where she makes a living as a chicken seller. Because she is not earning enough money to support her family well, she has decided to ask for a loan to buy more chickens to re-sell. She hopes to increase her income and improve her living conditions with this loan. Her husband, Mr. Sok Phorn, is a farmer who owns a small piece of land on which he cultivates rice. The couple has four children, three of whom are employed in garment factories, while one works in construction.

loans.use: To buy more chickens to re-sell.

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Along the national high way of Lupagan, Clarin, Misamis Occidetal lives Mrs. Marissa A. D.. She is  49 years old, married with 2 children.  Marissa and her husband operate a “CARENDERIA” (mini restaurant).  Her husband does farming but also cooks for their business.  The carenderia started in their home but they transfered it to a populous place that is more accessible to customers and travelers. They have been in business for fourteen years.
 
Marissa, a member in good standing of Hope Center,  is applying for a loan of $300 from Paglaum MPC for additonal capital for expansion and  to purchase kitchen utensils. .

Mrs. D. dreams of having her own restaurant someday, with the help of Pagalum MPC.

loans.use: To purchase additional cooking materials and supplies to her Carenderia

loans.name: Sarom

texts.en: Mr. Sarom S., 39, is a local farmer who specializes in rice crop as well as vegetables. He lives in Ptasrong Commune in Pursat Province. His wife, Mrs. Solin Yann, is 40 years old and makes a living breeding pigs from her home. She cares for four children, all of whom attend school. Recently, Solin sold all her pigs to a slaughterer, emptying her pen. She needs more piglets to raise again. Hence, she talked with her husband about requesting a loan of $800 to buy piglets and a motorcycle to make transportation easier.(Mr. Sarom's wife is pictured because he was not available)

loans.use: To buy more piglets and a motorcycle

loans.name: Khom

texts.en: Mrs. Khom S. is 52 years old and lives in Prey Chuor village in Takeo Province. She is a grocer who operates a small stall in the local market. Her husband, Mr. Teang Saroeun, is a farmer who owns a plot of land on which he cultivates rice. Even though both of them work, they do not have enough money to support their household. Mrs. Khom S. hopes to increase her income and improve her family’s standard of living with a loan to buy two cows for breeding. She and her husband have two children who are employed in garment factories.

loans.use: To buy two cows for breeding.

loans.name: Hai

texts.en: Mrs. Hai N. lives in Prey Chuor village in Takeo Province. She is a housewife who is a good cook and an excellent homemaker. Her husband, Mr. Som Keng, is musician. He has a small income, and finds it very difficult to provide a better life for his family. In order to improve their standard of living, Mrs. Hai N. has decided to ask for a loan to buy wood they can use to build a new home. She is 51 years old and the mother of five children, two of whom are employed in garment factories. Two others work in a bread shop and one is a monk.

loans.use: To buy wood to build a house so that this family can live in better conditions.

loans.name: Phorn

texts.en: Mrs. Phorn Y. is a 30-year-old who makes a living raising pigs, which provides the main income for sustaining her family. She cares for one young child and is married to Mr. Saren Phav, 33. Her husband is a local construction worker who always leaves home in the morning to work for a small firm in his area in Banteay Meanchey Province. Recently Saren has been facing difficulty with transportation; hence, Saren and his wife decided to ask for a $500 loan to purchase a motorcycle for transporting to work.

loans.use: To purchase her husband a motorcycle to use to commute to work

loans.name: Chanthol

texts.en: Mr. Chanthol T. is 57 years old and a truck driver. He has a truck to provide transportation service and deliver merchandise to his customers' houses. He currently earns approximately $5 per day. His wife, Mrs. Shiyat Soun, is 51 years old and has two children. Shiyat makes a living by selling Khmer Fritters in her home. Chanthol is concerned about his truck, which is often broken. Hence, he decided to request a $500 loan for repairing his truck and to buy ingredients for his wife to makes fritters to sell.

loans.use: To repair his truck and to buy ingredients for his wife's khmer fritter business

loans.name: Glenda

texts.en:
Glenda G. is a new member of ASHI, having just joined in October 2008. She is 30 years old and married to Christopher G., a fish vendor. They are blessed with three children.

Glenda used her first loan of Php 5,000.00 last November for additional capital for her variety store and her business cooking snacks sold around the village. She maintained a 100% credit rating for her next loans.

Glenda and her husband live a simple life. Even when they encounter struggles in their daily lives, they are positive that with their patience and industry they will reached their goals, especially their goal to provide a good education for their children.

loans.use: Variety store & food vending

loans.name: Cristo Vive Group

texts.en: Benita B. is a very young mother of one child. She is only 21 years old and has a son of 4 years. At this point she is living in extreme poverty and is also a single mother. She is requesting her second loan with Esperanza International (Kiva's Field Partner) and has a small business selling sweets in her neighborhood. Before her first loan, she had no steady income and needed a lot of help just to feed her child. She has experienced a little success with her first loan and feels that with this second loan she could really increase her business. For the first time in her life, she feels like she has something of her own and has a way to provide for her child. She is a very loving mother and much more mature than her years tell. She wants nothing more than a good life for her child, and wants someday to have her own house for her and her child. She is on the right path, and this next loan will help her take the next step!

loans.use: To buy food to sell

loans.name: Hanifan M.sharif Group

texts.en:
Hanifan Mai baji is a 53-year-old lady and resides in a city named Vehari, Pakistan. Her husband is M., who has a fertilizer-selling business. He provides fertilizer to land owners so that they are able to nourish their plants. Hanifan baji works in a rice mill where she packs the rice in sacks. She earns $10 per month. Hanifan baji successfully repaid her first loan from Asasah (a microfinance institute of Pakistan and a Kiva Field Partner). Now she is applying for a loan to buy more fertilizer for her husband.

She is joined in her loan group by a few more members. Sugran baji wants a loan to buy wheat and rice to resell. Musarat baji wants a loan to buy a sewing machine to sew clothes. Maryam baji wants a loan to buy groceries for her grocery shop.

This is a group loan. The loan funds will be distributed among the group members, each of whom will invest in her own business. The members mutually guarantee one another's loans. If one member does not repay, the other members are responsible.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer to resell; rice and wheat to resell; a sewing machine; and groceries for a grocery shop

loans.name: Ehsonjon

texts.en: H. Ehsonjon is 39 years old. He and his wife had raised 3 children. For 13 years Ehsonjon is selling the flowers. His trading place is located in the central flower market of the city and he works from the early morning till the late night. Once in two weeks Ehsonjon travels to Uzbekistan, the neighboring country for purchasing the flowers. For the years of his work Ehsonjon became an expert in his business knowing even how to safe the flowers during severe winter. The business is successful generating the stable income for the family. Ehsonjon repaid his previous loan ahead of schedule and as now it is season time he wants to take another loan. He requests 4000 Somoni ($ 1000 USD) for the term of 10 months. The loan shall be spent for purchasing the flowers for selling. Ehsonjon is the client of IMON for more than three years and having the positive credit history. He thanks all for supporting and promises to be precise in loan payment.

loans.use: Purchasing of the flowers for selling.

loans.name: Hanifa
